item.title: [DELTA] A few problems. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

try this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 256); rangeGFX(95, 256); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

item.title: [DELTA] A few problems. [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

I am working on my mage bow, mage longbow, and dark bow specs on players, and I have few problems.

What I have problems with:

  1. My Magic bow does not hit twice when I spec, plus the emote when I spec is not the correct one, when I am using the correct ID.

Code for this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 250, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 250); rangeGFX(95, 250); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

  1. My dark bow spec is way too over powered, and I am not sure why.

Code for this:
Player:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && specialAmount > 74 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 75, 250, 426); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(5); rangeGFX(85, 672); rangeGFX(65, 672); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

NPC:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 && !specOn){
DDS2Damg = true;
ddsInterval = 2000;
lastDds = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(426);
actionInterval = getbattleTimer();
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
}

I am not sure why these problems are occuring, and they may be from a different area? If anyone can help that would be great. thanks. =]

Read full topic
